findings.title: Revisited Logic in BitcoinEarningsOracle
findings.description: Inconsistency in day index meaning between BitcoinEarningsOracle and RiskControl contracts leads to unexpected daily earnings.

findings.title: Accommodation of Non-ERC20-Compliant Tokens
findings.description: The `transfer` function does not follow the ERC-20 standard specification and may cause issues if not handled properly.

findings.title: Suggested Adherence of Checks-Effects-Interactions Pattern
findings.description: Violating the `checks-effects-interactions` principle can lead to re-entrancy attacks, allowing malicious contracts to repeatedly call a vulnerable contract.

findings.title: Trust Issue of Admin Keys
findings.description: In the HashNFT protocol, there are certain privileged accounts (e.g., owner/ADMIN_ROLE/TRACK_ROLE) that play critical roles in governing and regulating system-wide operations, but these privileged accounts need to be scrutinized.
